data.text:
All right friends. This is the full list of Emmy nominations this year. Not just the prime time celebrity filled categories ‚Äì I mean the extended list. But most importantly‚Ä¶ I‚Äôve incuded my thoughts.

Drama Series

‚ÄúThe Boys‚Äù (Amazon Prime Video)

‚ÄúBridgerton‚Äù (Netflix)

‚ÄúThe Crown‚Äù (Netflix)

‚ÄúThe Handmaid‚Äôs Tale‚Äù (Hulu)

‚ÄúLovecraft Country‚Äù (HBO)

‚ÄúThe Mandalorian‚Äù (Disney Plus)

‚ÄúPose‚Äù (FX)

‚ÄúThis Is Us‚Äù (NBC)

Personally ‚Äì I‚Äôd love to see The Crown take this. I thought Bridgerton was fun, This Is Us has turned things around from past seasons, and of course I need to route for Toronto-made The Handmaid‚Äôs Tail ‚Äì but I LOVVVVVEEEEEEDDDDD The Crown. It‚Äôs one of my all time fav shows and I thought this season was particularly amazing.

Comedy Series

‚ÄúBlack-ish‚Äù (ABC)

‚ÄúCobra Kai‚Äù (Netflix)

‚ÄúEmily in Paris‚Äù (Netflix)

‚ÄúHacks‚Äù (HBO Max)

‚ÄúThe Flight Attendant‚Äù (HBO Max)

‚ÄúThe Kominsky Method‚Äù (Netflix)

‚ÄúPen15‚Äù (Hulu)

‚ÄúTed Lasso‚Äù (Apple TV Plus)

Confession ‚Äì the only Comedy show that was nominated that I saw was Emily in Paris. I have seen many comedy shows this year that were not nominated but should have been nominated over Emily in Paris. I hope Ted Lasso wins this. I don‚Äôt know why, I just know a lot of you love this and it feels like the type of show I‚Äôd love‚Ä¶ maybe it‚Äôs time to get Apple TV Plus.

Limited Series

‚ÄúI May Destroy You‚Äù (HBO)

‚ÄúMare of Easttown‚Äù (HBO)

‚ÄúThe Queen‚Äôs Gambit‚Äù (Netflix)

‚ÄúThe Underground Railroad‚Äù (Amazon Prime Video)

‚ÄúWandaVision‚Äù (Disney Plus)

Another category that I skipped. WHERE is the ‚ÄúTeen Drama‚Äù category haha.

BUT! What this category does tell us and what I LOVE to see is that Stories about Women are award worthy üôÇ

Lead Actor in a Drama Series

Sterling K. Brown (‚ÄúThis Is Us‚Äù)

Jonathan Majors (‚ÄúLovecraft Country‚Äù)

Josh O‚ÄôConnor (‚ÄúThe Crown‚Äù)

Reg√©-Jean Page (‚ÄúBridgerton‚Äù)

Billy Porter (‚ÄúPose‚Äù)

Matthew Rhys (‚ÄúPerry Mason‚Äù)

Okay ‚Äì my hope is that Josh O‚ÄôConnor wins this. He made The Crown this season. Truly an incredible role.

Lead Actress in a Drama Series

Uzo Aduba (‚ÄúIn Treatment‚Äù)

Olivia Colman (‚ÄúThe Crown‚Äù)

Emma Corrin (‚ÄúThe Crown‚Äù)

Elisabeth Moss (‚ÄúThe Handmaid‚Äôs Tale‚Äù)

Mj Rodriguez (‚ÄúPose‚Äù)

Jurnee Smollett (‚ÄúLovecraft Country‚Äù)

So I love ALL these women and I have no strong opinion on who should or shouldn‚Äôt win.

Lead Actor in a Comedy Series

Anthony Anderson (‚ÄúBlack-ish‚Äù)

Michael Douglas (‚ÄúThe Kominsky Method‚Äù)

William H. Macy (‚ÄúShameless‚Äù)

Jason Sudeikis (‚ÄúTed Lasso‚Äù)

Kenan Thompson (‚ÄúKenan‚Äù)

So I think Jason should win. For no other reason than he probably needs a win right now. Must be hard watching your ex hanging out with the hottest person in the world on a romantic italan vacation. You need a win sir.

Lead Actress in a Comedy Series

Aidy Bryant (‚ÄúShrill‚Äù)

Kaley Cuoco (‚ÄúThe Flight Attendant‚Äù)

Allison Janney (‚ÄúMom‚Äù)

Tracee Ellis Ross (‚ÄúBlack-ish‚Äù)

Jean Smart (‚ÄúHacks‚Äù)

Again, I adore all these women. Any of them could win and I‚Äôd be thrilled for them.

Lead Actor in a Limited Series or Movie

Paul Bettany (‚ÄúWandaVision‚Äù)

Hugh Grant (‚ÄúThe Undoing‚Äù)

Ewan McGregor (‚ÄúHalston‚Äù)

Lin-Manuel Miranda (‚ÄúHamilton‚Äù)

Leslie Odom Jr. (‚ÄúHamilton‚Äù)

I was very impressed with Hamilton but I have complex feelings about Hamilton being considered for TV things. You filmed a stage production‚Ä¶ yes win all the Tony‚Äôs but I‚Äôm not sure how I feel about them winning TV things. Hamilton a very different production from say WandaVision. That being said‚Ä¶ give Leslie Odom Jr. his Emmy.

Lead Actress in a Limited Series or Movie

Michaela Coel (‚ÄúI May Destroy You‚Äù)

Cynthia Erivo (‚ÄúGenius: Aretha‚Äù)

Elizabeth Olsen (‚ÄúWandaVision‚Äù)

Anya Taylor-Joy (‚ÄúThe Queen‚Äôs Gambit‚Äù)

Kate Winslet (‚ÄúMare of Easttown‚Äù)

I think there is going to be a massive Marvel Money campaign for Elizabeth Olsen, but I‚Äôd love to see Michaela Coel win for this one.

Variety Talk Series

‚ÄúConan‚Äù

‚ÄúThe Daily Show With Trevor Noah‚Äù

‚ÄúJimmy Kimmel Live!‚Äù

‚ÄúLast Week Tonight With John Oliver‚Äù

‚ÄúThe Late Show With Stephen Colbert‚Äù

So normally Last Week Tonight with John Oliver wins in this category. He‚Äôs won the 5 Emmy‚Äôs in a row. HOWEVER, this year might be the year someone else takes it. I‚Äôd be very interested in seeing what they all submitted for consideration because it was THE year for Vareity Talk Shows. The Pandmic had them all pivoting, and the news stories never stopped. I‚Äôd love to see Stephen Colbert take this one. But then‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs Conan‚Äôs last year and I wonder if they‚Äôll give him some flowers.

Competition Program

‚ÄúThe Amazing Race‚Äù

‚ÄúNailed It!‚Äù

‚ÄúRuPaul‚Äôs Drag Race‚Äù

‚ÄúTop Chef‚Äù

‚ÄúThe Voice‚Äù

Ok. This is a category that I have thoughts on. RuPaul‚Äôs Drag Race has won the last three years. Before that, The Voice had a three year streak, and before that The Amazing Race Took home 10 Emmy‚Äôs in this category. Top Chef won once in 2010. So really the only show to never have won is Nailed It! but personally, I‚Äôve never gotten into that show nor do I think it‚Äôs on the same level. Frankly I think RuPaul‚Äôs team will take this award again this year, but I‚Äôm bored. I‚Äôd like to see some fresh ideas in this category.

Television Movie

‚ÄúDolly Parton‚Äôs Christmas On The Square‚Äù

‚ÄúOslo‚Äù

‚ÄúRobin Roberts Presents: Mahalia‚Äù

‚ÄúSylvie‚Äôs Love‚Äù

‚ÄúUncle Frank‚Äù

I haven‚Äôt seen any of these movies ‚Äì but I‚Äôm always here to give Dolly Parton more awards.

Giancarlo Esposito (‚ÄúThe Mandalorian‚Äù)

O-T Fagbenle (‚ÄúThe Handmaid‚Äôs Tale‚Äù)

John Lithgow (‚ÄúPerry Mason‚Äù)

Tobias Menzies (‚ÄúThe Crown‚Äù)

Michael K. Williams (‚ÄúLovecraft Country‚Äù)

Chris Sullivan made me cry this year during This Is Us so I‚Äôd vote for him, but the rest of these men are so great. This is a competitive category with lots of worthy actors.

Supporting Actress in a Drama Series

Gillian Anderson (‚ÄúThe Crown‚Äù)

Helena Bonham Carter (‚ÄúThe Crown‚Äù)

Madeline Brewer (‚ÄúThe Handmaid‚Äôs Tale‚Äù)

Aunjanue Ellis (‚ÄúLovecraft Country‚Äù)

Emerald Fennell (‚ÄúThe Crown‚Äù)

Yvonne Strahovski (‚ÄúThe Handmaid‚Äôs Tale‚Äù)

Samira Wiley (‚ÄúThe Handmaid‚Äôs Tale‚Äù)

I‚Äôd love to see Emerald Fennell win this just so she can win an Emmy and an Oscar in the same year ‚Äì but if I was going to go for someone in the Crown to take this it would be Gillian Anderson and that‚Äôs my top pick for this category overall. She was so great as Margaret Thatcher.

Supporting Actor in a Comedy Series

Carl Clemons-Hopkins (‚ÄúHacks‚Äù)

Brett Goldstein (‚ÄúTed Lasso‚Äù)

Brendan Hunt (‚ÄúTed Lasso‚Äù)

Nick Mohammed (‚ÄúTed Lasso‚Äù)

Paul Reiser (‚ÄúThe Kominsky Method‚Äù)

Jeremy Swift (‚ÄúTed Lasso‚Äù)

Kenan Thompson (‚ÄúSaturday Night Live‚Äù)

Bowen Yang (‚ÄúSaturday Night Live‚Äù)

Give Bowen Yang all the awards for the Iceburg moment‚Ä¶ but he‚Äôs very new on the scene. When shows like Ted Lasso and SNL dominate categories ‚Äì I wonder who gets the campaign or if it splits votes. It will be very interesting to see who wins this.

Supporting Actress in a Comedy Series

Aidy Bryant (‚ÄúSaturday Night Live‚Äù)

Hannah Einbinder (‚ÄúHacks‚Äù)

Kate McKinnon (‚ÄúSaturday Night Live‚Äù)

Rosie Perez (‚ÄúThe Flight Attendant‚Äù)

Cecily Strong (‚ÄúSaturday Night Live‚Äù)

Juno Temple (‚ÄúTed Lasso‚Äù)

Hannah Waddingham (‚ÄúTed Lasso‚Äù)

The SNL girls had a really strong season this year. I wonder if Cecily Strong will get the compaign this year because it‚Äôs her last year OR if they‚Äôll push Kate because of her work as Anthony Fucci.

Thomas Brodie Sangster (‚ÄúThe Queen‚Äôs Gambit‚Äù)

Daveed Diggs (‚ÄúHamilton‚Äù)

Paapa Essiedu (‚ÄúI May Destroy You‚Äù)

Jonathan Groff (‚ÄúHamilton‚Äù)

Evan Peters (‚ÄúMare Of Easttown‚Äù)

Anthony Ramos (‚ÄúHamilton‚Äù)

We‚Äôre going to set aside my ‚ÄúHamilton shouldn‚Äôt be up for an Emmy‚Äù feelings for a moment and say yes give one of the Hamilton men an award because all three of them are fantastic. I wonder if Anthony Ramos will ride his In the Heights moment and pull out in front but really I think it might be about Jonathan Groff.

Ren√©e Elise Goldsberry (‚ÄúHamilton‚Äù)

Jean Smart (‚ÄúMare Of Easttown‚Äù)

Phillipa Soo (‚ÄúHamilton‚Äù)

Cue the music‚Ä¶ ‚ÄúAngelicaaaaa, Eliza‚Ä¶.‚Äù but no Peggy. Sucks to be Peggy but REALLY we‚Äôre give it to Kathryn Hahn. This was her moment.
